H0.text: The eldest son of a French King was always given which title. Prince of Wales

H1.text: The eldest son of a French King was always given which title. Duke of Normandy

H2.text: The eldest son of a French King was always given which title. Count of Champagne

H3.text: The eldest son of a French King was always given which title. Dauphin

A4.text: Dauphin of France was the title given to the heir apparent to the throne of France from 1350 to 1791

A5.text: The title was automatically conferred upon the next heir apparent to the throne in the direct line upon birth
